data.name: INEXAR Unusual Star
data.detailed_description:
A true sirvival horror story about how the INEXAR spacecraft (flight number # 19ABY1) arrived to refuel at the "Unusual Star", a scientific space station studying the star GlieZe V666.
INEXAR Captain Viktor Hill is a researcher, he is not a soldier, but he will not only have to fight with scientists overcome by evil, but also face a sense of fear and loneliness.
And you have to decide what is the real evil for you?
Maybe someone else is behind this evil...

And you can completely immerse yourself in history with the help of:

! First-person view
! Survivial horror atmosphere
! Complicated story
! Interesting Puzzles
! Space locations with breathtaking views

data.short_description: Survival horror story about how the INEXAR spacecraft arrived at the Unusual Star space station. INEXAR Captain Viktor Hill is an explorer, he is not a soldier, but he will not only have to face evil, but also a sense of fear and loneliness. But perhaps someone else is behind this evil...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 или AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 или AMD Radeon™ R7 260x с 2GB видеопамяти
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: ntel® Core™ i7-3770 или AMD FX™-9590 и мощнее
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 или AMD Radeon™ RX 480 с 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
